description:
On battle skill use, increases DMG dealt by 20% (2 turns).
On enemy break, increases ATK by 10% (2 turns).
name: This Is the Way of Ryushin-Ryu!

description:
On basic attack, increases SPD by 15% (1 turn).
On battle skill use, increases all allies' ATK by 5% (2 turns).
name: I've Already Made My Move

description:
On enemy break, increases critical rate by 10% (2 turns).
On battle skill use, increases break gauge depletion (2 turns).
name: Our Bond Gives Us Strength!

description: On enemy break, increases SPD by 20% (2 turns).
name: I Can Do It... I Know I Can!

description:
Increases debuff effects applied by 20% (* excluding action order delay effects).
On battle skill use, decreases target's DEF by 5% (2 turns).
* Not affected by increases to debuff effects.
name: Let's Find a Four-Leaf Clover!

description:
On taking at least 1 DMG from an enemy attack, decreases all allies' DMG taken by 5% (2 turns).
If under 80% HP, increases DEF by 10%.
name: I Already Decided That I'm Going to Do It

description: On enemy break, increases break bonus by 35% (2 turns).
name: Now Everything's Ruined!

description:
Increases buff effects applied by 20% (* excluding MP recovery and action order advance effects).
On basic attack, increases SPD by 10% (1 turn). * Not affected by increases to buff effects.
name: Time Is Money! Let's Make This Quick!

description:
On basic attack, advances action order by 10%.
If HP 50% or higher, increases DEF by 10%.
name: To Protect My Family!

description:
On battle skill use, increases all allies' critical rate by 10% (2 turns).
On critical hit, increases all allies' SPD by 2% (Stacks 5 times / 2 turns).
name: The Power Just Comes in like ZOOOM!

description: On follow-up attack, increases ATK by 25% (2 turns).
name: Seek and Destroy, That's All There Is to It

description: On battle skill use, increases SPD by 15% (2 turns).
name: Even a Gal Can Throw Down, You Know!

description:
On battle skill use, increases break gauge depletion (2 turns).

name: I Can Handle It on My Own!

description: Increases follow-up attack DMG dealt by 40%.

At turn start, grants 1 Magic (1 time per battle).

description:
Increases HP recovery amount by 10% (2 turns).
If under 50% HP, decreases DMG taken by 10%.

description:
Increases buff effects applied by 20% (* excluding MP recovery and action order advance effects).

description:
Increases special attack break gauge depletion.

description: If under 50% HP, increases ATK by 10% (Effect scales based on how low HP is; max 30%).

On battle skill use, increases critical rate by 5% (Stacks 3 times).

description:
Increases max HP by 10%.
Increases HP recovery amount by 15% for allies under 50% HP.

At turn start, grants 3 Magic (1 time per battle).

description: Increases SPD by 5% (Effect scales based on how many enemies there are; max 25%).

Increases DEF by 10%.

Increases buff effects applied by 20% (* excluding MP recovery and action order advance effects).

description:
Increases break gauge depletion.

Increases ATK by 5% (Effect scales based on how many enemies there are; max 25%).

description:
Increases HP recovery amount by 10%.
If under 40% HP, decreases DMG taken by 20%.

description:
On enemy break, increases break bonus by 30% (2 turns).

description:
Increases follow-up attack DMG dealt by 40%.

description:
At battle start, increases critical rate by 30% (3 turns).
On battle skill use, increases SPD by 10% (2 turns).

description:
Increases critical rate by 20%
On critical hit, increases SPD by 15% (2 turns).
name: The Weight of What You Bear Only Makes You Stronger

description:
Increases all allies' DMG dealt when targeting elemental weakness by 15%. * Not affected by increases to buff effects.
On basic attack, increases own SPD by 10% (1 turn). * Not affected by increases to buff effects or turn count.

description:
Increases DMG dealt to wounded enemies by 24%.
On follow-up attack, increases ATK by 2% (Stacks 10 times / 2 turns).

description:
Increases DMG dealt by 3% (Effect scales based on how many enemies there are; max 15%).
On special attack, increases ATK by 3% (Stacks 5 times).

description:
If under 50% HP, decreases DMG taken by 10%.
On basic attack, increases SPD by 10 (1 turn).

description:
Decreases DMG taken from enemies with 1 or more debuffs by 15%.
On battle skill use, increases critical rate by 20% (2 turns).
name: All Right, Time for Me to Make My Move!

description:
Applies the effect "If own HP 80% or higher, increases DEF by 10%" to all allies.
At battle start, advances action order by 30%.
name: I'll Protect My New Home

description:
On battle skill use, increases all allies' DMG dealt when targeting elemental weakness by 20% (2 turns). * Not affected by increases to buff effects or turn count.
On basic attack, increases SPD by 10% (1 turn). * Not affected by increases to buff effects or turn count.
name: I'm Not Afraid of Anything Anymore

description:
On battle skill use, decreases DMG taken by 20% (2 turns).
Increases DMG dealt when targeting an enemy's elemental weakness by 25%.

description:
Increases counterattack break gauge depletion.
Adds 1 turn to barrier.
name: There's No Way I'll Ever Regret It

description:
Increases special attack DMG dealt by 10%.
On battle skill use, grants 5 MP.
name: I Want to Be Able to Protect Her!

description:
On enemy break, advances own action order by 20%.
On basic attack, increases SPD by 10% (1 turn).
name: I Want to Be Someone Else

description:
On battle skill use, grants 15 MP.
When at least 3 enemies are present, increases special attack DMG dealt by 30%.
name: I'm Gonna Be Brave!

description:
If under 40% HP, increases SPD by 15%.
Decreases DMG taken by 20%.
name: I Want to Stand on My Own Two Feet!

description:
Increases critical rate by 15%.
On battle skill use, increases critical DMG by 5% (Stacks 5 times).
name: My Very Best Friend

description:
Increases all allies' critical rate by 10%.
Increases ATK for all allies with regeneration by 10%.

description:
On basic attack, increases SPD by 10% (1 turn). * Not affected by increases to buff effects or turn count.
On special attack, grants 5 MP.
name: I Can Make Miracles Happen Too!

description:
On DMG dealt to an enemy, grants 1 Magic.
When 5 or more debuffs are applied to enemies, increases SPD by 15%.
name: Do Not Underestimate Us

description:
At battle start, grants 40 MP.
Decreases DMG taken by 2% (Effect scales based on how many enemies there are; max -10%).
name: We'll Just Have to Push Through!

description:
On basic attack when 3 or more buffs are applied to self, advances action order by 10%.
Increases follow-up attack break gauge depletion.
name: Space Is My Special Thing!

description:
When at least 2 poisoned enemies are present, grants 5 MP at turn start.
Increases DMG dealt by self-applied ailments by 15%.
name: Whatever I Can Do as a Teller of Tales

description:
At battle start, increases SPD by 10% (1 turn; effect scales based on how many enemies there are; max 50%).
Increases follow-up attack break gauge depletion.
name: Thank Me Once You Die

description:
On basic attack, applies shield (10% / 1 time).
When at 5 Magic, increases forest DMG dealt by 25%.
name: It Isn't Summer Without a Few Thrills

description:
Increases vortex DMG dealt by 25%.
On basic attack, advances action order by 10%.
name: My Summer Break's Just Getting Started!

description: Increases DMG dealt when targeting elemental weakness by 15% and HP recovery amount by 20% for self or ally with active shield.
name: To Protect Our Memories of This Summer

description:
Increases special attack DMG dealt by 25%.
On basic attack, decreases DMG taken by 10% (1 turn).
name: Allow Me to Guide You!

description:
Increases MP recovery rate by 10%.
While Swallow's Providence is applied to self, decreases DMG taken by 10%.
name: I Think I'd Like to Help People

description: Increases own critical rate by 10% and follow-up attack critical DMG by 20%.
name: | I Have to Protect Them, No Matter What |

description: At battle start, grants 1 Magic. On basic attack, advances action order by 10%.
name: Results Will All Be Good
